feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: nichtich/App-Run
entry.summary:
Boilerplate for Applications

The Perl module App::Run provides a boilerplate for applications that can be executed both from command line and as backend. The package provides a convenient wrapper for initialization and configuration.

This module is not maintaned anymore, please just adopt it as you like or have a look at App::Cmd!
